snippet.title: Melon Brains (LaserActive Mega LD, 1994) - The Mind of the Dolphin
snippet.description:
http://laseractive.wordpress.com

Thanks to a generous video donation from Tom Porter (Maine), we at the LaserActive Preservation Project are able to present to you one of the rarest North American LaserActive games - Melon Brains. This dolphin edutainment title comes from the Multimedia Creators Network, the same whacked-out developers that brought you the LSD-fueled 3D Museum. Our channel features the game in its entirety (in English!). Enjoy the show!

This is the meat and potatoes of the Melon Brain's disc - an hour long documentary explaining dolphin physiology, psychology, behavior, and their connection with humans.
